heroImages.zhTitle: 湿地生态与栖息地可用性

storyImages.zhDesc: 当觅食潮滩与高潮栖息地被分离，迁徙期能量预算立刻变紧。
storyImages.enDesc: When feeding flats and roosts are separated, energy budgets tighten during migration.

storyImages.zhDesc: 更长距离与更频繁飞行会挤压觅食与恢复时间。
storyImages.enDesc: Longer and more frequent flights reduce time for feeding and recovery.

storyImages.zhDesc: 影响常常滞后出现，多项目叠加会放大风险。
storyImages.enDesc: Impacts are time-lagged; multiple projects can amplify risk.
